com.al.amf.remoting
Interface RemoteObject

public interface RemoteObject

The RemoteObject component lets you access stateless and stateful Java objects that are in the LiveCycle Data Services ES, BlazeDS, or ColdFusion web application's source path. The RemoteObject class gives you access to classes on a remote application server. Creates a new RemoteObject.
